AuthorDetails.Description: Full-stack developer specializing in dotnet, Umbraco and associated technologies. Contributing to Open source like Lucene.NET and Umbraco. Author of Nikcio.UHeadless an headless extension for Umbraco CMS.

RelatedPackages.Description: Extend Nikcio.UHeadless with Content (Included in Nikcio.UHeadless but useful for a custom setup)

An easy setup solution for making Umbraco headless
